page.title: 09 "The Home 1985" Con't
page.content:
It is also interesting to note that the majority of farmhouses had large vegetable gardens whereas the modern houses and cottages had large lawns, surrounded by neat flower beds.
{ LIFESTYLE 1985 ______________
On completing the section we found many different and interesting results.In answer to question one it was found that most people watch television especially during the evening.It was also found that many people relied on watching television as a form of entertainment, this is probably due to the fact that our area is quite remote, the nearest town being a few miles away.The most popular channel was either BBC1 or BBC2.
